paper.title: Safety and liveness from a methodological point of view

author.org: Institut für Informatik, Technische Universität München, Arcisstr 21, D-8000 München 2, Postfach 20 24 20, FRG
Institut für Informatik, Technische Universität München, Arcisstr 21, D-8000 München 2, Postfach 20 24 20, FRG

paper.abstract: Abstract Methodological sound characterizations of safety and liveness properties, which are relevant for the specification of distributed systems, are given. The recent characterizations by Alpern and Schneider are reviewed and some of their shortcomings are demonstrated. It is shown why they occur and that in our approach they are avoided. Finally some features of these characterizations are proved and their methodological impacts are discussed.
